projects.title: MatchMaker AI
projects.summary: NLP-powered resume matcher that ranks candidates by job fit using semantic similarity.
projects.description_html:
What it does

Extracts keywords/embeddings from resumes and job descriptions, compares them, and returns an ordered shortlist with scores.

How it works

  • Preprocess text (tokenize, clean, lemmatize)
  • Vectorize with TF-IDF or embeddings
  • Compute similarity (cosine) and rank

Why it matters

Reduces manual screening time and helps recruiters focus on high-signal candidates.

projects.title: Automation ROI Tracker
projects.summary: SQL + BI dashboard that quantifies time and cost savings from automations.
projects.description_html:
What it does

Aggregates task durations, frequencies, and costs to calculate ROI and payback for each automation.

How it works

  • ETL from Sheets/CSV to SQL
  • BI visuals for time saved and impact
  • Filters by team, process, quarter

Outcome

Clear picture of automation value for leadership.
projects.impact: Visibility into time saved across teams

projects.title: Recruiting Workflow Dashboard
projects.summary: Tracks hiring metrics across locations with Google Sheets API updates.
projects.description_html:
What it does

Shows time-to-fill, pipeline health, and source quality with near-real-time data.

How it works

  • Sheets API pulls into BI
  • Scheduled refresh
  • Drilldowns by role/location

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.summary: Static site (this one!) for projects, learning journey, and case studies.
projects.description_html:
What it does

Showcases projects and embeds live demos (Hugging Face) with a JSON-driven grid.

Stack

  • Vanilla HTML/CSS/JS
  • GitHub Pages
  • JSON data source
projects.impact: Central hub for learning in public
